ThoughtDef.label: simulation glitch
ThoughtDef.description: A flicker cut through the sim and I felt the seams around me slip.

li.label: unsettling glitch
li.description: I watched the seams tear and something inside me twisted.

ThoughtDef.label: fracturing glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The sim tore open around me, jagged echoes clawing at everything I thought was real.

li.label: frightening glitch
li.description: I felt the world split and drag me with it.

ThoughtDef.label: warming glitch
ThoughtDef.description: A soft break in the sim felt like a secret doorway I could step through.

li.label: warming glitch
li.description: I drifted through the glitch and it warmed me.

ThoughtDef.label: clinical glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The glitch blinked in and out; I logged it and moved on.

li.label: clinical glitch
li.description: I noted the error and kept going.

ThoughtDef.label: welcome glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The tear hummed through my implants and I felt ready to slip inside.

li.label: embraced the glitch
li.description: I rode the shimmer like it was built for me.

ThoughtDef.label: sterile glitch
ThoughtDef.description: I saw the sim break; mostly, I wondered how to reproduce it.

li.label: logged the glitch
li.description: I catalogued the tear and nothing stirred.

ThoughtDef.label: stalking glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The flicker felt aimed at me, whispering under my skin.

li.label: felt watched
li.description: I knew the glitch saw me; my nerves stayed coiled.

ThoughtDef.label: hunting glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The sim snapped with intent; it wanted me specifically.

li.label: pursued by the tear
li.description: I felt something crawl through the break and reach for me.

ThoughtDef.label: violating glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The glitch scraped across me like it hated my flesh.

li.label: body panic
li.description: I recoiled as the sim tried to rewrite me.

ThoughtDef.label: shattering glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The sim cracked like glass and I felt bits of me scatter.

li.label: splintered
li.description: I held my breath while everything splintered.

ThoughtDef.label: dissonant glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The world screamed in two keys at once and dragged me between them.

li.label: ripped between
li.description: I was pulled apart by competing signals.

ThoughtDef.label: echo glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The sim echoed back my own voice in a pitch that wasnâ€™t mine.

li.label: unsteady voice
li.description: I heard myself argue with me.

ThoughtDef.label: halo glitch
ThoughtDef.description: A ring of light circled me and the sim felt almost sacred.

li.label: warm halo
li.description: I stood in the glow and let it hold me up.

ThoughtDef.label: detached glitch
ThoughtDef.description: The glitch slid past and I drifted like a spectator.

li.label: watching
li.description: I watched myself inside the sim.

ThoughtDef.label: soothing glitch
ThoughtDef.description: A calm pulse rolled through the break and eased me.

li.label: soothed by static
li.description: I floated on the soft hiss.

ThoughtDef.label: archived glitch
ThoughtDef.description: I tagged the error, saved the log, and kept observing.

li.label: catalogued anomaly
li.description: I filed the glitch away for later.
